comment.author: 18532986@N07
comment._content:
"Chug-A-Lug"
Consolidated B-24D-CO Liberator
345th Bomb Squadron, 98th Bomb Group, 9th Air Force.
She is show after more artwork has been added before she is flown home to the U.S. for a War Bond tour. The plane was veteran of the August 1,1943 low-level mission to bomb the oil refineries around Ploesti,Romania. It was flown on the mission by the Morgan crew which returned to Libya with a dead gunner (T/Sgt. James Van Ness) and two other wounded crewmen (2nd Lt. Victor Larson - Navigator, and T/Sgt. Robert L. Tipton - Engineer).
